attributes.action: Compulsorily Purchase all UK farms and make them into roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By compulsorily purchasing all UK farms and turning them into roads, a 3 fold benefit would occur:
1. Reduce traffic congestion.
2. Save a fortune by not paying farmers subscriptions.
3. Give the farmers something real to whinge about.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
